name: Island Assault (itch)
description:
Island Assault is a top-down arcade shoot 'em up action game. You fly a futuristic ship on a mission to defeat an enemy stronghold situated on an archipelago of islands. Try to complete the game while aiming for a high score.

This game was created as a part of my bachelor's thesis about Godot Engine. Full source code and project assets are available on my GitHub page: https://github.com/OneginIII/2D-Game

Created using Godot Engine 3.4.2.
